ranks.text: After 5/6 and once you see the event in the airsoft shop with the 'package' you have to hold, talk to Iwai with rank 4 (dauntless) guts to start this cooperation.Unlocks Starter Customization, allowing you to tweak your guns for battle.
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Bonus: Proficency Up
choices: Choice 1: "That's probably the signal." to call him.
Choice 3: "How's your cold?" +2 / "What should I do now?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Medium Customization of your firearms.Bonus: Proficency Up
choices: Choice 2: "I always knew you were a thug." +3 / "Y-Yakuza?!" +2
Choice 3: "We made a deal, didn't we?" +3

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Proficency Up
choices: Choice 4: "Where's my reward?" +3 / "You two should play nice." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks a Discount for gun customization.Bonus: Proficency Up
choices: Choice 3: "That's right." +3 / "I'll stick around for the guns." +3

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Advanced Customization for your guns.Bonus: Proficency Up
Requires rank 5 guts.Impactful conversation choices for this rank:After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked.Complete the quest, then return to Iwai.Bonus: Proficency Up
choices: Choice 1: "I did it all for Iwai." +3 / "It most definitely was." +2
Choice 2: "I will." +2 / "I want to help you." +2
Choice 2: "I guess I could consider it." +3 / "If you pay me well." +3 / "I'm back, baby." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 1: "Are you sure he's alive?" +3 / "That's great news." +2
Choice 5: "Tell him the truth." +3 / "You need to trust your son." +3
Choice 6: "He's a cool kid, huh?" +3 / "Karou is really strong willed." +3

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.Unlocks Special Customization, the maximum type of gun type weapon customization.Bonus: Proficency Up
